@graph.caption: A loaf of chocolate swirl bread cut in half on a work surface

@graph.name: Chocolate swirls Bread! - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Chocolate swirls bread. Pretty chocolate swirls bread great toasted with tea or coffee. Vegan Recipe.

@graph.name: Chocolate Swrils Bread
@graph.description: Chocolate swirls bread. Pretty chocolate swirls bread great toasted with tea or coffee. Vegan Recipe.

recipeInstructions.text: Warm half a cup (120ml) of water and add 1 teaspoon sugar and yeast to it. Mix well
recipeInstructions.name: Warm half a cup (120ml) of water and add 1 teaspoon sugar and yeast to it. Mix well

recipeInstructions.text: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: In 1/4 cup (60ml) hot water, mix in the cocoa powder and 1 Tablespoon sugar and keep aside for cooling.
recipeInstructions.name: In 1/4 cup (60ml) hot water, mix in the cocoa powder and 1 Tablespoon sugar and keep aside for cooling.

recipeInstructions.text: Take 1/3 of the yeast mixture, 1 (or 1.5)cup bread flour, cocoa mixture, 1 teaspoon butter and knead into a soft dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Take 1/3 of the yeast mixture, 1 (or 1.5)cup bread flour, cocoa mixture, 1 teaspoon butter and knead into a soft dough.

recipeInstructions.text: In a greased mixing bowl, add the rest of the flours and salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a greased mixing bowl, add the rest of the flours and salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the remaining butter, yeast mixture, and water and knead for 8-10 minutes. ( if using stand mixer, 3-4 minute batches with intermittent scraping)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the remaining butter, yeast mixture, and water and knead for 8-10 minutes. ( if using stand mixer, 3-4 minute batches with intermittent scraping)

recipeInstructions.text: Place both doughs in separate well greased containers, covered in a warm place for 2 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Place both doughs in separate well greased containers, covered in a warm place for 2 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Knead the doughs separately into balls.
recipeInstructions.name: Knead the doughs separately into balls.

recipeInstructions.text: Take both doughs and roll them out into 10 or 12 inch squares of even thickness. The chocolate dough will be about 1/8 inch thick and the regular dough about a 1/4 inch thick. Use extra flour if necessary.
recipeInstructions.name: Take both doughs and roll them out into 10 or 12 inch squares of even thickness. The chocolate dough will be about 1/8 inch thick and the regular dough about a 1/4 inch thick. Use extra flour if necessary.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chocolate dough on top on the regular dough square.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the chocolate dough on top on the regular dough square.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold them together twice to get a smaller square.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold them together twice to get a smaller square.

recipeInstructions.text: Roll them out again to about 10 inches square.
recipeInstructions.name: Roll them out again to about 10 inches square.

recipeInstructions.text: Roll them like a jelly roll from one side tightly and seal the open side to the roll with water.
recipeInstructions.name: Roll them like a jelly roll from one side tightly and seal the open side to the roll with water.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the roll on a greased baking tray with the sealed side down.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the roll on a greased baking tray with the sealed side down.

recipeInstructions.text: Make deep cuts on the roll an inch apart. Step by step and pictorial for similar shaping here
recipeInstructions.name: Make deep cuts on the roll an inch apart. Step by step and pictorial for similar shaping here

recipeInstructions.text: Spray some oil on top and cover with damp towel. Let rise for 40 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Spray some oil on top and cover with damp towel. Let rise for 40 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 375 degrees F for about 40 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 375 degrees F for about 40 minutes.
